verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> went <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple, <S%G2411><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> see <S%G2396><s%> what manner <S%G4217><s%> of stones <S%G3037><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G4217><s%> buildings <S%G3619><s%> are here!

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Seest <S%G991><s%> thou these <S%G5025><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> buildings? <S%G3619><s%> there shall not <S%G3364><s%> be left <S%G863><s%> one stone upon another, <S%G3037><s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3037><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> be thrown down. <S%G2647><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives <S%G1636><s%> over against <S%G2713><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple, <S%G2411><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%> privately, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%>

Tell <S%G2036><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> shall these things <S%G5023><s%> be? <S%G2071><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall be the <S%G3588><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> be fulfilled? <S%G4931><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> them <S%G846><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> Take heed <S%G991><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man deceive <S%G4105><s%> you: <S%G5209><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> Christ; and <S%G2532><s%> shall deceive <S%G4105><s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye shall hear <S%G191><s%> of wars <S%G4171><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rumors <S%G189><s%> of wars, <S%G4171><s%> be ye not <S%G3361><s%> troubled: <S%G2360><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> such things must needs <S%G1163><s%> be; <S%G1096><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> shall not be yet. <S%G3768><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> shall rise <S%G1453><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> kingdom: <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> earthquakes <S%G4578><s%> in divers places, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> famines <S%G3042><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> troubles: <S%G5016><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are the beginnings <S%G746><s%> of sorrows. <S%G5604><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> take heed <S%G991><s%> to yourselves: <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they shall deliver you up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5209><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> councils; <S%G4892><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> ye shall be beaten: <S%G1194><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall be brought <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> rulers <S%G2232><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> for my sake, <S%G1752><s%> <S%G1700><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> against them. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> be published <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations. <S%G1484><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they shall lead <S%G71><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and deliver you up, <S%G3860><s%> take no thought beforehand <S%G4305><s%> <S%G3361><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> ye shall speak, <S%G2980><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> do ye premeditate: <S%G3191><s%> but whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall be given <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> ye: for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> that speak, <S%G2980><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> shall betray <S%G3860><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> the son; <S%G5043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> shall rise up <S%G1881><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> their parents, <S%G1118><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall cause them to be put to death. <S%G2289><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> ye shall be <S%G2071><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men for my name's sake: <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3686><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he that shall endure <S%G5278><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the end, <S%G5056><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye shall see <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> abomination <S%G946><s%> of desolation, <S%G2050><s%> spoken of <S%G4483><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> Daniel <S%G1158><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophet, <S%G4396><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> it ought <S%G1163><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> (let him that readeth <S%G314><s%> understand,) <S%G3539><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> let them <S%G3588><s%> that be in <S%G1722><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mountains: <S%G3735><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> let him <S%G3588><s%> that is on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> housetop <S%G1430><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> go down <S%G2597><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> therein, to take <S%G142><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G848><s%> house: <S%G3614><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> let him that is <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> field <S%G68><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> turn back <S%G1994><s%> again <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3694><s%> for to take up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G848><s%> garment. <S%G2440><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> to them that are with child, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to them that give suck <S%G2337><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days! <S%G2250><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> ye that <S%G2443><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> flight <S%G5437><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> in the winter. <S%G5494><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> affliction, <S%G2347><s%> such as <S%G3634><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5108><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the creation <S%G2937><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> this time, <S%G3568><s%> <S%G2532><s%> neither <S%G3364><s%> shall be. <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> that the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had shortened <S%G2856><s%> those days, <S%G2250><s%> no <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3756><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> should be saved: <S%G4982><s%> <S%G302><s%> but <S%G235><s%> for the elect's sake, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1588><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he hath chosen, <S%G1586><s%> he hath shortened <S%G2856><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> Lo, <S%G2400><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> is Christ; <S%G5547><s%> or, <S%G2228><s%> lo, <S%G2400><s%> he is there; <S%G1563><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> him not: <S%G3361><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> false Christs <S%G5580><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> false prophets <S%G5578><s%> shall rise, <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall show <S%G1325><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wonders, <S%G5059><s%> to seduce, <S%G635><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it were possible, <S%G1415><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> elect. <S%G1588><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> take ye heed: <S%G991><s%> <S%G5210><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I have foretold <S%G4280><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sun <S%G2246><s%> shall be darkened, <S%G4654><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> moon <S%G4582><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> her <S%G848><s%> light, <S%G5338><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> shall <S%G2071><s%> fall, <S%G1601><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> powers <S%G1411><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> shall be shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall they see <S%G3700><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the clouds <S%G3507><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall he send <S%G649><s%> his <S%G848><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall gather together <S%G1996><s%> his <S%G848><s%> elect <S%G1588><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> winds, <S%G417><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the uttermost part <S%G206><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the uttermost part <S%G206><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fig tree; <S%G4808><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> her <S%G846><s%> branch <S%G2798><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> yet <S%G2235><s%> tender, <S%G527><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> putteth forth <S%G1631><s%> leaves, <S%G5444><s%> ye know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> summer <S%G2330><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> near: <S%G1451><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> in like manner, <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye shall see <S%G1492><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> come to pass, <S%G1096><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> nigh, <S%G1451><s%> even at <S%G1909><s%> the doors. <S%G2374><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> pass, <S%G3928><s%> till <S%G3360><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> be done. <S%G1096><s%>
Heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall pass away: <S%G3928><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> pass away. <S%G3928><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that hour <S%G5610><s%> knoweth <S%G1492><s%> no man, <S%G3762><s%> no, not <S%G3761><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Take ye heed, <S%G991><s%> watch <S%G69><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pray: <S%G4336><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> is. <S%G2076><s%>

For the Son of man is as <S%G5613><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> taking a far journey, <S%G590><s%> who left <S%G863><s%> his <S%G848><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to his <S%G848><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to every man <S%G1538><s%> his <S%G848><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> commanded <S%G1781><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> porter <S%G2377><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> watch. <S%G1127><s%>

Watch <S%G1127><s%> ye therefore: <S%G3767><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> master <S%G2962><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> cometh, <S%G2064><s%> at even, <S%G3796><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> at midnight, <S%G3317><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> at the cockcrowing, <S%G219><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in the morning: <S%G4404><s%>
Lest <S%G3361><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> suddenly <S%G1810><s%> he find <S%G2147><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> sleeping. <S%G2518><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto all, <S%G3956><s%> Watch. <S%G1127><s%>
